alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 11:06AM EST until February 08 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent precipitation has caused the Green River to rise, and will be above flood stage at Paradise through early next week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 381.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 383.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
